data.subject: Heartbeat (Feat. Ferry Corsten, Kago Pengchi) (English Ver.)
data.lyric:
I was in between the silence 
 and the static Oh 
 In a room between the basement 
 and the attic al

data.subject: Heartbeat (Feat. Ferry Corsten, Kago Pengchi)
data.lyric:
침묵과 정적뿐이었던
 공간 사이 Oh
 빛을 찾지 못한 우린
 어린아이 Alone
 오늘 뭔가 변했어
 To have a heartbeat heartbeat
 난 살아있다는 걸
